thread.title: Nice Little Hotel -
thread.title_full: Nice Little Hotel - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ion A
title: Nice Little Hotel -
text:
This is an inexpensive little spot in the Upper East Side close to subway, central park, restaurants and museums, in a great neighbourhood. The lobby, the room and the whole place is a bit dated and slightly grungy, but it is sanitary. The room was typically NY small, but could have used a bit more furniture...at least a shelf or table. The bathroom had been reno'd and was superb. Tiny slow elevators are the norm. The staff were courteous, and minimal so dont expect miracles but they were eager to help when not busy. Solid value in UES of NYC.
Room Tip: Ask for a Park view... See more room tips
